text:
@IngrahamAngle HOAX! The inflated death numbers, forced lockdowns and shutdown of society are all part of a Hoax.

LA Times reporting that the VAST majority of people being tested already have antibodies for COVID19.  Its the same antibodies and genetic material of the common cold!
